The Transfer Package

The Transfer package provides generic data communication capabilities for moving data on a structured AMR patch hierarchy. This support is divided into these categories:

  1. spatial coarsen/refine and time interpolation operator interfaces
  2. classes for moving data between patch levels on an AMR patch hierarchy

All class names in the Transfer package are in the SAMRAI::xfer namespace.

Generated on 8 Oct 2014 for SAMRAI by  1.6.1
